version_description: - Corrected psf to psi (Pressure unit) conversion

- Fixed critical bug that could crash the app
- Switched to new server

-Iphone X optimized
-Ipad multitasking improvements
-switched to new method of saving favorites
-Added conversions (and some removed):
Weight/Mass:
Troy Pound
Troy Ounce
Pennyweight
Grain
Carat
Currency:
Bitcoin
Cayman Islands Dollar - KYD
Lithuanian Litas - removed (no longer in use, replaced by Euro)
Latvian lats - removed (no longer in use, replaced by Euro)
Belarusian ruble - BYR replaced by new BYN (New Belarusian Ruble)

-Fixed decimal point input
-Fixed infinite loop on iOS 8 and iOS 9
-Favorites star was missing for iOS 10 and less. Now it's back

- Privacy policy added - link in settings
- Support for iPhone X, XS, XS Max, XR, etc.
- Support for iPad Pro 12.9 (1st, 2nd, 3rd gen), 11, etc.
- iPad Split View support improvements
- Added inches of water under Pressure category
- Fixed fast search bug
- Cleanup and renaming of some currency codes
